comments:
On 11/11 WTP
We create utility java project and copy it to the war file using
WARFile.copyLib().  There is no bin folder created by JavaProjectCreation op
and the WARFile.copyLib() fails with the exceptions below.

On wtp 11/05 the bin folder not created by the java project creation op
but the addCopyLib() works.
